author: KRIV
title: Why was it so hazy in Houston on May 9? | Flipboard
text: Why is it so hazy in Houston? Thursday, May 9, Houston residents had to deal with smoky, hazy skies and FOX 26 Meteorologist Remeisha Shade explains why that was and when it may clear up. More stories from [FOX26Houston](/@FOX26Houston) Join the flipboard community Discover, collect, and share stories for all your interests [Sign up](/signup) More stories from [Weather](/topic/weather) [Video: These parts of Mass. have greatest chance of rain](/topic/weather/video-these-parts-of-mass-have-greatest-chance-of-rain/a-KtCwKa0HQ8GrvoQxF9w3Vg%3Aa%3A3473364735-4915cd7bb4%2Fflipboard.com) Mike Wankum has a look at the forecast for Boston, Massachusetts and New England. - Storyboard Americans' biggest fears when they leave the safety of their own home [See the 11-mile path Kalamazoo County’s tornado took Tuesday](/topic/weather/see-the-11-mile-path-kalamazoo-county-s-tornado-took-tuesday/a-QGXLSCiJTLqh7esdiAM1Dg%3Aa%3A2877899648-efa278eaf1%2Fmlive.com) PORTAGE, MI -- The National Weather Service Grand Rapids has mapped the path of the Tuesday, May 7, tornado that ripped through Portage.
